channel.title: Hidden mod hidden admin
channel.description: how cani had hidden mod and hidden admin

item.title: Hidden mod hidden admin
item.dc:creator: @Dayne Dayne
item.description:
@Dayne wrote:

Just give someone a player right number, e.g. player right = 103247
And in your commands, set certain commands for them, e.g. command ("::master") && player rights = 103247
Only players with that player right can use it.
A hidden mod and hidden admin are basically the same as normal mods and admins but crowns donâ€™t show. So having a set player right to them will allow them to access the commands which their player right is under. If you know what I mean.

Read full topic
